infotexts.entitydescription.mb_containerholder: holds a storage container and neatly displays it
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_maxcomponent: Requires Lua. Returns the bigger of the two inputs.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_mincomponent: Requires Lua. Returns the smaller of the two inputs.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_containscomponent: Requires Lua. Returns 0 or 1 depending on if signal one contains signal two.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_startswithcomponent: Requires Lua. Returns 0 or 1 depending on if signal one starts with signal two.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_endswithcomponent: Requires Lua. Returns 0 or 1 depending on if signal one ends with signal two.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_repeatcomponent: Requires Lua. Returns X repeated Y times.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_watercomponent: Requires Lua. Outputs various water metrics of the submarine.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_lengthcomponent: Requires Lua. Outputs the amount of characters in the input signal.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_reactorcomponent: Requires Lua. Automatically manages the reactor.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_startupcomponent: Requires Lua. Outputs a "1" signal after the round started. May cause false positives when reloading lua. Should never be combined with a detonator.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_inertiainhibitor: Requires Lua. Stops the submarine from moving.
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_omniengine: Requires Lua. It's an engine that can go up and down. Memory component uses: 1: Force X 2: Force Y 3: Max. Force 4: Max. Power consumption
infotexts.entitydescription.mb_chairiscope: It's like a periscope, but it's a chair!
